title: Frontend Developer
description: Comfortable with modern JS stack, experience with React.

title: Software engineer
description: Analysis, logical thinking, teamwork and attention to detail.

title: Systems analyst
description: Ability to extract and analyse information, good communication, persuasion and sensitivity.

title: Business analyst
description: Communication, presentation, facilitation, project management and problem solving.

title: Technical support
description: Wide ranging tech knowledge, problem solving, communication/listening, patience and diplomacy.

title: Network engineer
description: Specialist network knowledge, communication, planning, analysis and problem solving.

title: Technical consultant
description: Communication, presentation, technical and business understanding, project management and teamwork.

title: Technical sales
description: Product knowledge, persuasion, interpersonal skills, drive, mobility and business awareness.

title: Project manager
description: Organisation, problem solving, communication, clear thinking, and the ability to stay calm under pressure.

title: Web developer
description: Basic understanding of web technologies (client side, server side and databases), analytical thinking, problem solving and creativity.

title: Software tester
description: Attention to detail, creativity, organisation, analytical and investigative thinking, and communication.

title: Senior Web Administrator
description: Deployment Support development teams on production sites and development areas.

title: .NET Developer
description: Collaboratively work with others to build and maintain various projects for a wide range of clients
